meanings.definition: A department or division within a larger organization or department.
meanings.sent1: The company's finance subdepartments handle budgeting and financial planning.
meanings.sent2: The subdepartments of the hospital include cardiology, pediatrics, and oncology.
meanings.sent3: The subdepartments decided to have a pizza party to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, subdepartments are like puzzle pieces that fit together to form the whole organization.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flags outside each subdepartment made it easy to navigate the campus.

meanings.definition: A smaller unit or section within a larger organization or department.
meanings.sent1: The marketing subdepartments focus on different aspects of promoting the products.
meanings.sent2: Each subdepartment has its own manager responsible for overseeing daily operations.
meanings.sent3: The subdepartments competed in a friendly game of trivia during the team-building event.
meanings.sent4: The subdepartments in the university are like branches of a tree, each contributing to the overall growth.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of the subdepartments was crucial for the success of the project.
